review: For someone like me who doesn't want to pay cable and looks for free streams online, this is the best device. I am glad that along with ESPN, HBO GO, HULU PLUS & NETFLIX, I can also cast my chrome tab for shows that are not available on these apps (usually websites that provide this type of content for free are ad-heavy, so I need my adblocker extension to make it watchable)Right now I am casting a chrome tab to watch Men's Volleyball Championship (which is available for free thru Polish TV). No A/V sync problem, no hassle.I am super-satisfied with this product.
author: Hedy
